item.title: 6 Rules Every Platform Engineer Should Know for Crafting Clear Technical Announcements - Part I
item.description: The way you craft and structure technical announcements is key to capturing and retaining the attention of developers. Developers are: natural problem-solvers with a keen ability to see through unclear (aka, BS) information many are non-native English speakers, which makes clear and structured communication even more critical. In these series, you’ll learn 6 essential rules to help you craft clear technical announcements. Rule 1: Use Active Voice Using active voice in technical writing is crucial for clarity and engagement.
